Companies are now telling workers to confess if they’re using AI at work… which is basically corporate bait. The second you admit you automated part of your job, your boss won’t congratulate you—they’ll either give you more work or quietly replace you. This video breaks down the ridiculous article pushing this narrative and why you should never give away your competitive edge.
title: THIS WILL GET PEOPLE FIRED! (WHY YOU DONT TELL YOUR BOSS ABOUT AI)
